alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:58AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Bayfield, southeastern Douglas, eastern Washburn, southwestern Ashland and Sawyer Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Barnes, to Hayward, to Birchwood, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Round Lake, Little Round Lake and Seeley around 305 AM CDT. Drummond, Town of Delta and Chief Lake on Chippewa Flowage around 310 AM CDT. Chippewa Flowage West around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Chippewa Flowage East, Radisson, Exeland, Benoit, Sanborn and Marengo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
